languages.text: "В-ваша Светлость! Могу ли я чем-нибудь вам... всеуслужить? Я из экипажа Риззы... бывшего, стало быть, экипажа, раз она {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}милость Императора, того, познала{/d}. Новый, это, агент негоциации Пустотного братства на Футфоле. Жажду засвидетельствовать свое архипочтение Вашей Светлости и предложить свои услуги. Расправы расправами, а дела тоже делать надо, п-правда же?"

traits.locale_text: "В-ваша Светлость! Я один из ребяток Риззы, м-мигом примчался, как услышал, что она того, милость Императора познала… Я, это, новый агент Пустотного братства на Футфоле, значит. Хотел засвидетельствовать свое почтение Вашей Светлости, так сказать, и предложить свои услуги. Расправы расправами, а дела тоже делать надо, п-правда же?"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"
languages.original_text: "В-ваша Светлость! Могу ли я чем-нибудь вам... всеуслужить? Я из экипажа Риззы... бывшего, стало быть, экипажа, раз она {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}милость Императора, того, познала{/d}. Новый, это, агент негоциации Пустотного братства на Футфоле. Жажду засвидетельствовать свое архипочтение Вашей Светлости и предложить свои услуги. Расправы расправами, а дела тоже делать надо, п-правда же?"

traits.locale_text: "Y-your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that she's known the Emperor's mercy and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, er, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: “大、大人！您需要我……如何为您服奉呢？我是莱萨的船员……可以说，之前是吧，毕竟她现在已经{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}得到了帝皇的安宁{/d}。总之，我是虚空协联在落脚港的新任……呃，贸务代理人。我非常迫切地向您保证，我对您充满了崇尊的敬意，随时愿意为您效劳。毕竟，无论有没有恐怖统治，生意总归都是要做的，您说是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"

traits.locale_text: “大、大人！您需要我……如何为您服奉呢？我是莱萨的船员……可以说之前是吧，毕竟她现在已经得到了帝皇的安宁。总之，我是虚空协联在落脚港的新任……呃，贸务代理人。我非常迫切地向您保证，我对您充满了崇尊的敬意，随时愿意为您效劳。毕竟，无论有没有恐怖统治，生意总归都是要做的，您说是吗？”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: 「陛下！ど、どうすれば私は、あなたの…お役力に立てますか？私はリザの仲間…{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}彼女が皇帝陛下の安寧として知られるようになった{/d}今では、多分、元仲間です。とにかく、虚空の仲間の新しい、えっと、フットフォールの商業エージェントです。陛下に絶高の敬意を表し、サービスを提供したいと思います。恐怖の支配があろうがなかろうが、ビジネスは必要なのです。違いますか？」
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！ど、どうすれば私は、あなたの…お役力に立てますか？私はリザの仲間…{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}彼女が皇帝陛下の安寧として知られるようになった{/d}今では、多分、元仲間です。とにかく、虚空の仲間の新しい、えっと、フットフォールの商業エージェントです。陛下に絶高の敬意を表し、サービスを提供したいと思います。恐怖の支配があろうがなかろうが、ビジネスは必要なのです。違いますか？」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: «M-mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Cómo puedo servirle? Formo parte de la tripulación de Ryzza... su antigua tripulación, supongo, ahora que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}ha conocido la Paz del Emperador{/d} y todo eso. Soy el... nuevo agente comercial de la Hermandad del Vacío en Paso. Estoy ansioso por mostrarle mis maximuchos respetos y ofrecerle mis servicios. Hay negocios que hacer, con o sin reino de terror, ¿no es así?».
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"

traits.locale_text: «M-mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Cómo puedo servirle? Formo parte de la tripulación de Ryzza... su antigua tripulación, supongo, ahora que ha conocido la paz del Emperador y todo eso. Soy el... nuevo agente comercial de la Hermandad del Vacío en Paso. Estoy ansioso por mostrarle mis maximuchos respetos y ofrecerle mis servicios. Hay negocios que hacer, con o sin reino de terror, ¿no es así?».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "E-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wie kann ich mich ... behilfreich machen? Ich gehöre zu Ryzzas Crew ... also, äh, ihrer ehemaligen Crew, nachdem sie jetzt den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}Frieden des Imperators kennt{/d} und alles. Jedenfalls bin ich der neue, äh, Kammerzonialrat der Gefährten der Leere auf Footfall. Ich versichere Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft meinen ultrameisten Respekt und biete meine Dienste an. Es gibt ja Geschäfte zu machen, Schreckensherrschaft hin oder her, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"

traits.locale_text: "E-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wie kann ich mich ... behilfreich machen? Ich gehöre zu Ryzzas Crew ... also, äh, ihrer ehemaligen Crew, nachdem sie jetzt den Frieden des Imperators kennt und alles. Jedenfalls bin ich der neue, äh, Kammerzonialrat der Gefährten der Leere auf Footfall. Ich versichere Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft meinen ultrameisten Respekt und biete meine Dienste an. Es gibt ja Geschäfte zu machen, Schreckensherrschaft hin oder her, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: « V-Votre Seigneurie ! Comment est-ce que je peux vous... servicer ? Je fais partie de l'équipage de Ryzza... Enfin, de son ancien équipage, j'imagine, maintenant qu'{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}elle a eu droit à la paix de l'Empereur{/d}, tout ça. Bref, je suis le nouveau, euh, agent commercionnaire de la Communauté du vide à Castel. Je suis là pour présenter ma plus grande respectitude à Votre Seigneurie et pour vous offrir mes services. Après tout, règne de terreur ou pas, faut que les affaires tournent, hein ? »
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"

traits.locale_text: « V-Votre Seigneurie ! Comment est-ce que je peux vous... servicer ? Je fais partie de l'équipage de Ryzza... Enfin, de son ancien équipage, j'imagine, maintenant qu'elle a eu droit à la paix de l'Empereur et tout ça. Bref, je suis le nouveau, euh, agent commercionnaire de la Communauté du vide à Castel. Je suis là pour présenter ma plus grande respectitude à Votre Seigneurie et pour vous offrir mes services. Après tout, règne de terreur ou pas, faut que les affaires tournent, hein ? »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "L... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Size nasıl... Hizmetli olabilirim? Ryzza'nın tayfasındanım... Gerçi artık eski tayfası oluyor herhâlde, hani {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}İmparator'un Huzuru'na kavuştu{/d} falan ya. Neyse, Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin Binliman'daki yeni... Taciri temsilcisiyim ben. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne layık olduğu azimi saygıyı göstererek hizmetlerimi sunacağımdan emin olabilirsiniz. Korku krallığı falan hikâye, bizim yapacak işimiz var. Haksız mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! How can I be of... servicity? I'm from Ryzza's crew... her former crew, I suppose, now that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}she's known the Emperor's peace{/d} and all. Anyway, I'm the Fellowship of the Void's new, err, commercionary agent on Footfall. I'm eager to assure Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship of my ultramost respect and offer my services. There's business to be done, reign of terror or no reign of terror, am I right?"
